content.question: In the passage, the author is primarily concerned with

choices.label: cautioning her audience against repeating past mistakes
enumerating the most pressing social issues facing women today
offering her audience advice for the future
identifying the most important skills for adapting in uncertain times

content.answer: offering her audience advice for the future

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
